brand_identity.name: En Tu Sano Juicio
brand_identity.archetype: JEWEL & LUXURY (Archetype 5) mixed with PERFORMANCE PRO
brand_identity.emotional_goal: Eating healthy is a premium lifestyle choice, not a compromise.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, product names. Use tracking-tight for sizes > 32px.

menu.grid: Responsive Grid (1 col mobile, 2 col tablet, 3 col desktop)
menu.card_style: Minimalist, Image-First, Dark Glass overlay for text

dashboard.style: Sharp edges, data-focused, dark mode only

buttons.primary: bg-[#C08040] text-black hover:bg-[#D4A060] font-medium rounded-sm px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border border-[#C08040] text-[#C08040] hover:bg-[#C08040] hover:text-black rounded-sm px-8 py-3

cards.product: bg-[#121212] border border-white/5 hover:border-[#C08040]/30 transition-all duration-300 group overflow-hidden relative
cards.feature: bg-transparent border-l border-white/10 pl-6 hover:border-[#C08040] transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-[#171717] border-white/10 focus:border-[#C08040] text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 rounded-sm h-12

navigation.bar: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-[#0A0A0A]/80 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/5

hero.description: Chef plating food, dark moody, perfect for Hero background
Black dinner plate on grey background, minimalist

bowls.description: Dark glass bowl with berries (can be used for acai/fruit bowls)
White bowl with salad on wooden table, dark lighting

wraps.description: Hand holding a healthy wrap, dark background

anti_ai_rules: NO gradients on text unless specifically for a 'Gold' effect.
NO 'Inter' font for headings. Use Playfair Display.
NO centered text for long descriptions.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #EDEDED on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Use Copper (#C08040) ring for focus states.

motion.hover: Subtle lift (-2px) and glow on cards.
motion.transitions: All interactive elements must have duration-300 ease-out.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Premium Dark Mode Food Delivery App. The aesthetic is 'Night Luxe'. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the menu categories. Ensure the Admin Dashboard is dense and data-heavy, while the Customer facing pages are spacious and editorial. Use 'Playfair Display' for all headings to give it that gourmet feel. Do not deviate from the Dark Mode requirement.
